spell.name: Corrupting Spores
entries: A small patch of three poison mushrooms magically sprout in a 5-foot square that you can see within range. The mushrooms emit toxic spores, and any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the mushroom patch must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 1d8} poison damage for each mushroom in the patch and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.
Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on your turn to cause an additional mushroom to sprout within the patch.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, one additional mushroom sprouts within the initial patch for each slot level above 4th.
